Check if a specific asset (by ID) is owned by this wallet.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>

  title={"Body"}

>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from is_asset_owned","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response with asset ownership status","required":["owned"],"properties":{"owned":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the asset is owned by this wallet","example":true}},"title":"IsAssetOwnedResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
